docs: # W3B2 Program Instruction Interface
Each public function in this module corresponds to a callable on-chain instruction.
The detailed logic for each instruction is implemented in the [`instructions`] module.

instructions.name: admin_ban_user
docs: Bans a user, preventing them from interacting with the service.
See [`instructions::admin_ban_user`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the admin's wallet) who must be the `authority` of the `admin_profile`.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` of the admin initiating the ban. Constraints verify
the `authority` and the PDA seeds.

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The `UserProfile` to be banned. This account will be mutated to set `banned = true`.
A constraint ensures this user profile is associated with this specific `admin_profile`.

instructions.name: admin_close_profile
docs: Closes an `AdminProfile` account and refunds its rent lamports to the owner.
See [`instructions::admin_close_profile`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the admin's wallet) who must be the `authority` of the `admin_profile`.
This account will receive the rent lamports back from the closed account.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` account to be closed. Constraints verify the `authority`
and PDA seeds. The `close` directive tells Anchor to return all lamports
from this account to the `authority`.

instructions.name: admin_dispatch_command
docs: Dispatches a non-financial command from an admin to a user.
See [`instructions::admin_dispatch_command`] for details.

accounts.name: admin_authority
docs: The `Signer` of the transaction (the admin's wallet).

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The admin's own profile PDA. Constraints ensure that the `admin_authority`
is the legitimate owner of this profile.

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The target `UserProfile` to which the command is being sent. A constraint
ensures this profile is associated with this specific `admin_profile`.

instructions.name: admin_register_profile
docs: Initializes a new `AdminProfile` PDA for a service provider.
See [`instructions::admin_register_profile`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the admin's wallet) who will become the owner of the new `AdminProfile`.
This account pays for the creation of the `admin_profile` PDA.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The new `AdminProfile` account to be initialized. Its address is a PDA
derived from the `authority`'s key, ensuring one profile per admin.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The Solana System Program, required by Anchor for account creation (`init`).

instructions.name: admin_set_config
docs: Sets or updates the configuration for an existing `AdminProfile`.
See [`instructions::admin_set_config`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the admin's wallet) who must be the `authority` of the `admin_profile`.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` account to be updated. Constraints verify the `authority`
and the account's PDA seeds.

instructions.name: admin_unban_user
docs: Unbans a user, restoring their access to the service.
See [`instructions::admin_unban_user`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the admin's wallet) who must be the `authority` of the `admin_profile`.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` of the admin initiating the unban. Constraints verify
the `authority` and the PDA seeds.

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The `UserProfile` to be unbanned. This account will be mutated to set `banned = false`.
A constraint ensures this user profile is associated with this specific `admin_profile`.

instructions.name: admin_withdraw
docs: Withdraws earned funds from an `AdminProfile`'s internal balance.
See [`instructions::admin_withdraw`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the admin's wallet) who must be the `authority` of the `admin_profile`.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` from which funds will be withdrawn. Constraints
verify that the `authority` is the legitimate owner and the PDA seeds are correct.

accounts.name: destination
docs: The account that will receive the withdrawn lamports. It is marked as `mut`
because its lamport balance will be increased.
**Security:** `CHECK:` is used here because this account is only a destination for a
lamport transfer from a program-controlled PDA. No data is read from or written to it,
so deserialization into a typed account is unnecessary and inefficient.

instructions.name: log_action
docs: Logs a significant off-chain action to the blockchain for an audit trail.
See [`instructions::log_action`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` of the transaction, who can be either the user or the admin associated
with the profiles.

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The `UserProfile` associated with the action being logged.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` associated with the action being logged.

instructions.name: user_close_profile
docs: Closes a `UserProfile` account and refunds all lamports to the user.
See [`instructions::user_close_profile`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the user's wallet) who must be the `authority` of the `user_profile`.
This account will receive all lamports from the closed account.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` associated with the `user_profile`, required to derive the user PDA.

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The `UserProfile` account to be closed. The `close` directive will transfer
all its lamports (rent and deposit balance) to the `authority`.

instructions.name: user_create_profile
docs: Creates a `UserProfile` PDA, linking a user's wallet to a specific admin service.
See [`instructions::user_create_profile`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the user's wallet) who will become the owner of the new `UserProfile`.
This account pays for the creation of the `user_profile` PDA.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` PDA that this new user profile will be linked to.
This account is read-only but its existence and PDA derivation are verified.

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The new `UserProfile` account to be initialized. Its address is a PDA
derived from the user's `authority` key and the `admin_profile`'s PDA key,
ensuring a unique profile for each user-service pair.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The Solana System Program, required by Anchor for account creation (`init`).

instructions.name: user_deposit
docs: Deposits lamports into a `UserProfile` PDA to pre-fund future payments.
See [`instructions::user_deposit`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the user's wallet) who must be the `authority` of the `user_profile`.
This account is the source of the deposited funds.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` associated with the `user_profile`. This is required
to correctly derive and verify the `user_profile` PDA address.

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The `UserProfile` to receive the deposit. Constraints verify the PDA seeds
(linking it to the `authority` and `admin_profile`) and ownership.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The System Program, required to perform the lamport transfer from the user's
wallet to their profile PDA.

instructions.name: user_dispatch_command
docs: Dispatches a command from a user to a service, verifying a signed price from an oracle.
See [`instructions::user_dispatch_command`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` of the transaction (the user's wallet).

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The user's profile PDA. It is debited for the command `price`. Constraints ensure
the `authority` is the owner and the profile is linked to the correct `admin_profile`.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The target `AdminProfile` of the service being called. It is credited with the
command `price`. Its seeds are checked to ensure it's a valid profile.

accounts.name: instructions
docs: The Instructions sysvar (`ixs`), used to verify the preceding `Ed25519Program`
instruction for oracle signature authentication.
**Security:** `CHECK:` is used as we are only reading instruction data from this
sysvar account, not deserializing its data.

instructions.name: user_request_unban
docs: Allows a banned user to pay a fee to request an unban from the admin.
See [`instructions::user_request_unban`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the user's wallet) who must be the `authority` of the `user_profile`.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` associated with the `user_profile`. Its internal balance
will be credited with the `unban_fee`.

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The `UserProfile` requesting the unban. Its `deposit_balance` will be debited
for the fee, and `unban_requested` flag will be set to `true`.

instructions.name: user_update_comm_key
docs: Updates the `communication_pubkey` for an existing `UserProfile`.
See [`instructions::user_update_comm_key`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the user's wallet) who must be the `authority` of the `user_profile`.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` associated with the `user_profile`, required to derive the user PDA.

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The `UserProfile` account whose `communication_pubkey` will be updated.

instructions.name: user_withdraw
docs: Withdraws unspent funds from a `UserProfile`'s deposit balance.
See [`instructions::user_withdraw`] for details.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The `Signer` (the user's wallet) who must be the `authority` of the `user_profile`.

accounts.name: admin_profile
docs: The `AdminProfile` associated with the `user_profile`, required to derive the user PDA.

accounts.name: user_profile
docs: The `UserProfile` from which funds will be withdrawn.

accounts.name: destination
docs: The account that will receive the withdrawn lamports.
**Security:** `CHECK:` is used here because this account is only a destination for a
lamport transfer. No data is read from or written to it.

errors.name: SignerUnauthorized
errors.msg: Signer is not the authorized authority for this profile.

errors.name: AdminMismatch
errors.msg: Admin Mismatch: The provided UserProfile is not associated with the provided AdminProfile.

errors.name: InsufficientDepositBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient Deposit Balance: The user's deposit is not enough to pay for this command.

errors.name: InsufficientAdminBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient Admin Balance: The admin's internal balance is not enough to cover the withdrawal amount.

errors.name: RentExemptViolation
errors.msg: Rent-Exempt Violation: This transaction would leave the PDA with a balance below the rent-exempt minimum.

errors.name: PayloadTooLarge
errors.msg: Payload Too Large: The provided payload exceeds the maximum allowed size.

errors.name: InstructionMismatch
errors.msg: Instruction Mismatch: Expected an Ed25519 signature verification instruction.

errors.name: SignatureVerificationFailed
errors.msg: Signature Verification Failed: The oracle signature could not be verified.

errors.name: InvalidOracleSigner
errors.msg: Invalid Oracle Signer: The signer does not match the registered oracle authority.

errors.name: TimestampTooOld
errors.msg: Timestamp Too Old: The provided timestamp is outside the acceptable time window.

errors.name: UserIsBanned
errors.msg: User Is Banned: This action cannot be performed while the user is banned.

errors.name: UserNotBanned
errors.msg: User Not Banned: This user is not currently banned.

errors.name: UnbanAlreadyRequested
errors.msg: Unban Already Requested: An unban request is already pending for this user.

errors.name: CannotBanSelf
errors.msg: Cannot Ban Self: An admin cannot ban their own profile.

types.name: AdminCommandDispatched
docs: Emitted when an admin sends a command (notification) to a user.

fields.name: sender
docs: The public key of the admin's wallet (`authority`), who is the initiator of this command.

fields.name: sender_admin_pda
docs: The public key of the sender's `AdminProfile` PDA.

fields.name: target_user_pda
docs: The public key of the target `UserProfile` **PDA**.

fields.name: command_id
docs: A `u64` identifier for the specific command or notification being sent.

fields.name: payload
docs: An opaque byte array containing application-specific data for the command.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp when the command was dispatched.

types.name: AdminConfigUpdated
docs: Emitted when an admin updates their profile configuration.

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the admin's wallet (`authority`) that authorized this update.

fields.name: admin_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` PDA that was updated.

fields.name: new_oracle_authority
docs: The new public key for the oracle.

fields.name: new_timestamp_validity
docs: The new validity period for oracle signatures in seconds.

fields.name: new_communication_pubkey
docs: The new public key for off-chain communication.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the update.

types.name: AdminFundsWithdrawn
docs: Emitted when an admin withdraws earned funds from their profile's internal balance.

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the admin's wallet (`authority`) who initiated the withdrawal.

fields.name: admin_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` PDA from which funds were withdrawn.

fields.name: amount
docs: The amount of lamports withdrawn from the `AdminProfile`'s internal balance.

fields.name: destination
docs: The public key of the wallet that received the withdrawn funds.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the withdrawal.

types.name: AdminProfile
docs: # Admin Profile
Represents the on-chain profile for a Service Provider (an "Admin").
This PDA holds the service's configuration and serves as a treasury for collected fees.
Its address is deterministically derived from the admin's wallet key, ensuring that
each admin can only have one profile.
- **PDA Seeds:** `[b"admin", authority.key().as_ref()]`

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the admin's wallet. This key is the sole `authority`
allowed to manage this profile (e.g., withdraw funds, change configuration).

fields.name: communication_pubkey
docs: A public key provided by the admin for secure off-chain key exchange,
typically used for hybrid encryption with users.

fields.name: oracle_authority
docs: The public key of the off-chain oracle responsible for signing price data.
The program will only accept price information signed by this authority.
By default, this is set to the `authority` key.

fields.name: timestamp_validity_seconds
docs: The duration in seconds for which an oracle's signature is considered valid.
This helps prevent replay attacks with old price data.

fields.name: balance
docs: The internal balance in lamports where fees from paid user commands are collected.
This balance can be withdrawn by the admin via the `admin_withdraw` instruction.

fields.name: unban_fee
docs: The fee in lamports that a banned user must pay to request an unban.
This can be configured by the admin.

types.name: AdminProfileClosed
docs: Emitted when an `AdminProfile` PDA is closed, effectively unregistering the service.

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the admin's wallet (`authority`) whose profile was closed.

fields.name: admin_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` **PDA** that was closed.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the account closure.

types.name: AdminProfileRegistered
docs: Emitted when a new AdminProfile PDA is created.
This signifies that a new service has been registered on the protocol.

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the admin's wallet (`authority`), which serves as the unique owner
and signer for the `AdminProfile` PDA.

fields.name: admin_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` PDA that was registered.

fields.name: communication_pubkey
docs: The public key provided by the admin for secure off-chain communication,
typically used for hybrid encryption.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the registration occurred.

types.name: AdminUnbanFeeUpdated
docs: Emitted when an admin updates the unban fee for their service.

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the admin's wallet (`authority`) that authorized this update.

fields.name: admin_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` PDA that was updated.

fields.name: new_unban_fee
docs: The new fee in lamports for requesting an unban.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the update.

types.name: OffChainActionLogged
docs: A generic event for logging significant off-chain actions for auditing purposes.

fields.name: actor
docs: The public key of the wallet (`authority` of either a user or admin) that performed the off-chain action.

fields.name: user_profile_pda
docs: The public key of the `UserProfile` PDA involved in this action.

fields.name: admin_profile_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` PDA involved in this action.

fields.name: session_id
docs: A `u64` identifier used to correlate multiple off-chain actions to a single on-chain session.

fields.name: action_code
docs: A `u16` code representing the specific type of off-chain action taken (e.g., 200 for HTTP OK).

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the logged action.

types.name: UserBanned
docs: Emitted when an admin bans a user.

fields.name: admin_authority
docs: The public key of the admin's wallet (`authority`) who initiated the ban.

fields.name: admin_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` PDA of the admin.

fields.name: user_profile_pda
docs: The public key of the `UserProfile` PDA that was banned.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the ban.

types.name: UserCommKeyUpdated
docs: Emitted when a user updates their off-chain communication public key.

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the user's wallet (`authority`) who authorized this update.

fields.name: user_profile_pda
docs: The PDA of the user profile that was updated.

fields.name: new_comm_pubkey
docs: The new communication public key for the `UserProfile`.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the update.

types.name: UserCommandDispatched
docs: Emitted when a user calls a service's command, potentially a paid one.

fields.name: sender
docs: The public key of the user's wallet (`authority`), who is the initiator of the command.

fields.name: sender_user_pda
docs: The public key of the sender's `UserProfile` PDA.

fields.name: target_admin_pda
docs: The public key of the target `AdminProfile` **PDA**.

fields.name: command_id
docs: A `u16` identifier for the specific command being executed.

fields.name: price_paid
docs: The amount in lamports deducted from the user's deposit balance for this command (0 if free).

fields.name: payload
docs: An opaque byte array containing application-specific data for the command.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp when the command was dispatched.

types.name: UserFundsDeposited
docs: Emitted when a user deposits funds into their `UserProfile` to pay for services.

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the user's wallet (`authority`) who made the deposit.

fields.name: user_profile_pda
docs: The PDA of the user profile that received the deposit.

fields.name: amount
docs: The amount of lamports deposited into the `UserProfile`.

fields.name: new_deposit_balance
docs: The user's new total `deposit_balance` after this transaction.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the deposit.

types.name: UserFundsWithdrawn
docs: Emitted when a user withdraws unspent funds from their `UserProfile`.

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the user's wallet (`authority`) who made the withdrawal.

fields.name: user_profile_pda
docs: The PDA of the user profile from which funds were withdrawn.

fields.name: amount
docs: The amount of lamports withdrawn from the `UserProfile`.

fields.name: destination
docs: The public key of the wallet that received the funds.

fields.name: new_deposit_balance
docs: The user's new total `deposit_balance` after this transaction.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the withdrawal.

types.name: UserProfile
docs: # User Profile
Represents a user's on-chain profile for a *specific* Admin service.
A single user wallet (`authority`) can have multiple `UserProfile` PDAs—one for each
service they interact with. This PDA holds the user's prepaid balance for that service
and tracks their status (e.g., `banned`).
- **PDA Seeds:** `[b"user", authority.key().as_ref(), admin_profile.key().as_ref()]`

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the user's wallet. This key is the sole `authority`
allowed to manage this profile (e.g., deposit/withdraw funds, close profile).

fields.name: communication_pubkey
docs: A public key provided by the user for secure off-chain key exchange.

fields.name: admin_profile_on_creation
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` **PDA** this user profile was created for.
This field permanently and verifiably links the user's profile to a specific service.

fields.name: deposit_balance
docs: The user's prepaid balance in lamports for this specific service. This balance
is debited by the `user_dispatch_command` instruction to pay for services.

fields.name: banned
docs: A flag indicating whether the user is banned from using the service.
If `true`, most user-initiated actions will be blocked by the program.

fields.name: unban_requested
docs: A flag indicating that the user has paid the `unban_fee` and requested to be unbanned.
This does not automatically lift the ban; it only signals the request to the admin.

types.name: UserProfileClosed
docs: Emitted when a `UserProfile` PDA is closed.

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the user's wallet (`authority`) whose profile was closed.

fields.name: user_pda
docs: The public key of the `UserProfile` PDA that was closed.

fields.name: admin_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` **PDA** this profile was linked to.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the account closure.

types.name: UserProfileCreated
docs: Emitted when a new `UserProfile` PDA is created, linking a user to a specific admin.

fields.name: authority
docs: The public key of the user's wallet (`authority`), which is the sole owner of this `UserProfile` PDA.

fields.name: user_pda
docs: The public key of the `UserProfile` PDA that was created.

fields.name: target_admin_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` **PDA** that this `UserProfile` is associated with.

fields.name: communication_pubkey
docs: The public key provided by the user for secure off-chain communication.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the profile creation.

types.name: UserUnbanRequested
docs: Emitted when a user pays the fee to request an unban.

fields.name: user_authority
docs: The public key of the user's wallet (`authority`) who requested the unban.

fields.name: user_profile_pda
docs: The public key of the `UserProfile` PDA.

fields.name: admin_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` PDA this user is linked to.

fields.name: fee_paid
docs: The fee paid by the user in lamports.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the request.

types.name: UserUnbanned
docs: Emitted when an admin unbans a user.

fields.name: admin_authority
docs: The public key of the admin's wallet (`authority`) who lifted the ban.

fields.name: admin_pda
docs: The public key of the `AdminProfile` PDA of the admin.

fields.name: user_profile_pda
docs: The public key of the `UserProfile` PDA that was unbanned.

fields.name: ts
docs: The Unix timestamp of the unban.
